title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre boosted and supported by like-minded souls now, and youre more than willing to return the favor. Knowing that people are in your corner is no modest treasure. A friend who delivers a sweet or silly phrase that makes you laugh or motivates you adds sunshine to your day. Their faith in you can be a key building block for a new start in life. Honor the members of your personal tribe by exchanging heartfelt messages with each other. Philosopher Seneca wrote, One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
